Project_details.title: React Weather App
Project_details.description: A weather app built with React that allows users to view the current weather and forecast for a location. Users can search for locations and save their favorite locations for quick access.
features: Used the OpenWeatherMap API to get weather data.
Display the current weather for the user's current location on the home screen.
Show a list of the user's favorite locations on the home screen for easy access. The list is stored locally on the device and persists across app sessions.
Search for locations by name, city, state, or country on the search button. The search results are displayed in a list.
View the current weather and forecast for a selected location on the detail screen.
Used a context provider for state management. e.g updating favourite city from seach or detail screen and updating that on favourite section in current city
installation: Install the dependencies using npm install.
Display the current weather for the user's current location on the home screen.
Run the app using npm start.
Project_details.usage: On the home screen, the app displays the current weather for the user's current location and a list of their favorite locations. To add a location to the favorite list, click the 'Add to favourite' button on the home screen and detail for the location. To view the weather for a location, type the city, state or country name in input field on search/home screen. The app displays the current weather and forecast for the location on can be seen on detail screen. by tapping 'see more'
